long_description: A do-it-all ride for kids ready to go off pavement, the Diamondback Octane 20 in. kids' bike features a shock-absorbent fork and tough aluminum frame to handle any terrain. Sturdy frame is constructed out of heat-treated aluminum for durable performance; sloped top tube accommodates a short stand-over height. Trail XC suspension fork offers 30mm of travel to smooth out rough roads and take the jolts out of bumps and roots on the trail. 6-speed setup keeps it simple while offering a range of gears to tackle varying terrain; chain ring guard helps protect clothes from getting greasy or caught in the crankset. Shimano Revo twist shifter is easy to use-all a rider has to do is twist the grip-integrated shifter to change gears with a flick of the wrist. Linear-pull brakes supply sure stopping power and speed management; brake levers are sized for small hands. The rear derailleur hanger, a part that is particularly vulnerable to breakage from young riders, can be easily replaced and extends the usable life of the frame. Specs are subject to change.
short_description: A do-it-all ride for kids ready to go off pavement, the Diamondback Octane 20 in. kids' bike features a shock-absorbent fork and tough aluminum frame to handle any terrain.
